resources.string: Our servers are not responding to the email activation request. Please try again later.
Click the activation link we sent to your email address so we can verify your account.
Do you want to delete your account?
To delete your account, you must have logged in recently.
Are you sure you want to log out?
Our servers are not responding to the password reset request. Please try again later.
Check your inbox. If an account was previously registered with this email address, you will see a password reset link.
You can continue the password reset process using the link sent to your email address.
Entries with a review interval of 30 days or more will be deleted.
Please select your native and target language from the side panel.
Expressions you add to your learning list will appear in translations.
Add expressions you want to see in translations to your learning list.
You have logged in with your email account (xxx).
You have logged in with Google (xxx).
I want to change my password.
into the language of your choice.
AI evaluates your translation in 4 ways: Grammar, spelling, naturalness, and meaning.
If you\'re stuck, you can leave it blank and continue:
If you want to practice an expression more frequently, add it to your learning list.
Select the language to translate into:
We\'ll send a password reset link to your email.
I’m seeing this for the first time.
I know it, but I want to practice.

There’s more: You can choose a difficulty level and make sure the expressions or patterns you\'re interested in appear frequently. If you want to learn using spaced repetition, just add the expressions to your learning list.
Please enter the expression you want to search for.
Unfortunately, the expression you entered contains a typo.
There is a mismatch in meaning.
The AI could not respond due to high demand.
We’re sorry for the inconvenience you experienced.
To make up for the issue, we will add a one-month subscription to your account.
No previously downloaded voice file was found for this language. Please download a voice file and restart the app.
This phrase is not commonly used in English. You can still add it, but be aware that AI may warn you not to use it in sentences.
In your searches, you can use placeholders in parentheses instead of fixed text:
Your translation is not in the expected language. Your target language is set to %1$s in your account settings.

"%1$s" I tried to translate into %2$s. My translation was: "%3$s" Please evaluate my translation in %4$s for grammar, spelling, meaning, and naturalness. Your answer must be in %4$s and in the following JSON format: { "isValid": "true / false.", "feedBack": "Evaluation in %4$s." }

"%1$s" I tried to translate into my native language. I translated it as: "%2$s" Please evaluate my translation only for meaning accuracy; grammar and spelling are not important to me. Your answer must be in %3$s and in the following JSON format: { "isValid": "true / false.", "feedBack": "Evaluation in %3$s." }

"%1$s" I tried to translate into %2$s. My incomplete translation: "%3$s" The blank in my translation indicates the part I could not translate. Please evaluate my translation in %4$s for grammar, spelling, meaning, and naturalness. Your answer must be in %4$s and in the following JSON format: { "feedBack": "Evaluation in %4$s.", "completeSentence": "Complete the %2$s translation filling the blanks." }

"%1$s" I tried to translate into my native language. My incomplete translation: "%2$s" The blank in my translation indicates the part I could not translate. Please evaluate my translation only for meaning accuracy; grammar and spelling are not important to me. Your answer must be in %3$s and in the following JSON format: { "feedBack": "Evaluation in %3$s.", "completeSentence": "Complete the %2$s translation filling the blanks." }

My native language is %1$s. And I want to translate the sentence "%2$s" into %3$s. Please explain step by step how I should translate it. Your answer must be in the following JSON format: { "translation": "Write the translated sentence in %3$s.", "explanation": "Detailed explanation in %1$s." }
It seems there are some issues with your search. The final decision is up to you.
The searched word might not exist in the target language.
The searched word may contain spelling mistakes.
The word and meaning might not match.
The searched term might not be commonly used in the target language.
Something went wrong, please refresh your search.
Tap on the words to listen to their pronunciation.
Your password can be any 6-character combination.
This email address is already registered.
Please enter a valid email address.
An error occurred. Please try again.
Your daily translation limit has been reached.
There must be at least %1$s sentences. Please refresh your search.
There is a problem with your internet connection.
Some features could not be loaded.

Your translation is grammatically correct, conveys the meaning accurately, and sounds natural in \'%1$s\'. The most common and natural equivalent of \'%2$s\' in \'%1$s\' is \'%3$s\'. Great translation.
